prompt: A professional Asian woman, dressed in smart business attire, is seated at a modern office desk with large windows and natural light. The office features contemporary furniture, potted plants, and a few colleagues in the background engaged in conversation. The atmosphere is lively yet professional, with a mix of genders and ethnicities represented among the staff. Vary the woman's pose and expression, sometimes standing confidently, other times reviewing documents or interacting with a coworker.

A professional Black man in tailored business attire stands confidently in a bright, stylish office with glass walls and tasteful modern decor. The setting includes a collaborative workspace with diverse colleagues visible in the background, engaged in discussion or working at desks. Sometimes show him seated at a conference table, other times walking through the office or sharing a friendly conversation with a peer.

A professional white woman, dressed in elegant businesswear, is in a contemporary workplace with open space, indoor plants, and natural sunlight. She may be seen talking with a colleague, reviewing documents, or seated at a desk. Background activity includes coworkers of various backgrounds interacting, contributing to a dynamic and inclusive office environment. Vary her stance and activity to ensure visual variety.

A professional Latino man in smart office attire is in a modern office setting with a collaborative, energetic atmosphere. Show him engaged in conversation with a colleague, reviewing paperwork, or standing by a window with city views. The office features minimalist furniture, green plants, and a diverse team interacting in the background. Change his activity and position to add variety.

A professional Middle Eastern woman VC partner, wearing stylish business clothing, sits confidently at a boardroom table in a well-lit, contemporary meeting room. The space is furnished with sleek chairs, a large table, and large windows with city views. Include several colleagues in the background engaged in discussion or preparing for a meeting, reflecting a diverse and professional environment. Vary her pose and interactions with others to maintain visual interest.

A professional, diverse team of men and women collaborating around a table in a bright, modern office workspace. Some are standing, others are seated, all engaged in a lively discussion. Papers, notebooks, coffee cups, and laptops are scattered across the table, with large windows letting in natural daylight. The environment feels energetic and focused, with contemporary furniture and indoor plants visible in the background. The team members wear smart casual business attire, and their body language shows active engagement and collaboration.

A group of professional, diverse venture capital analysts gathered around a wooden table in a well-lit, modern office environment. They are engaged in a collaborative discussion, reviewing printed documents, paper charts, and notes. The setting features large windows, indoor plants, and contemporary furniture, with a warm and inviting atmosphere. The analysts are dressed in smart business attire, expressing focus and engagement. No screens, no tech devices, no text, no posters, and no abstract elements are present in the scene.
